name: DREAMcatcher (itch) (nytouu)
description:
controls :

left/right/up/down - movement

x - dash / c - attack or interact (door, shopkeeper)

Small game (very) inspired by Hyper Light Drifter that I made in 1 month,

playing in the browser is recommended, electron builds are available if you want to play it locally.

source code available here (poorly coded)
